key_risks: Intense competition from rivals like Google My Business and Moz
Challenges in customer retention and declining Annual Recurring Revenue (ARR)
Data privacy and compliance risks with regulations like GDPR and Privacy Shield
Macroeconomic headwinds exacerbating customer defection and revenue growth issues
controversies: AI-powered customer support delivering unrelated search results and failing to understand user queries
Executive retention strategy relying heavily on incentives like restricted stock units
environmental_issues: None explicitly mentioned, though Yext leverages green data centers powered by renewable energy
social_issues: Customer dissatisfaction due to ineffective AI-powered support solutions
governance_issues: Reliance on executive retention awards to maintain leadership stability
